messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Great online game
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the link....if you like that one, you ll love these! http://pbskids.org/cyberchase/inventions/ and
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the link....if you like that one, you'll love these! http://pbskids.org/cyberchase/inventions/ and http://kids.discovery.com/games/whizzball/whizzball.html
Beth




________________________________
From: BRIAN POLIKOWSKY <polykowholsteins@...>
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com; AlwaysUnschooled@yahoogroups.com; ECHO-MN@yahoogroups.com; shinewithunschooling@yahoogroups.com; unschoolingmn@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, February 3, 2009 11:58:36 AM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Great online game


A friend of mine send me this link yesterday.
It is fabulous. Its a game but diferent.
You get to create a contraption online to get to a goal.
I had a lot of fun with it!
http://www.fantasti ccontraption. com/

enjoy!
 
Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow. blogspot. com/

http://groups. yahoo.com/ group/unschoolin gmn/

<polykowholsteins@...> wrote:
>
> A friend of mine send me this link yesterday.
> It isï¿½fabulous. Its a game but diferent.
> You get to create a contraption online to get to a goal.
> I had a lot of fun with it!

I recognise that name. Yes, my son Pat was playing it for a while a
couple of months ago. I had a go myself and got stuck at a fairly
early level, but he went on to complete all the 21 free levels. It's
an amazing game.

He said something to me last week, now I think of it, about finding
another game online that's "like Fantastic Contraption". I'll ask him
about that when I see him.

Bob
